name: battlestation
description: A configurable panel with action buttons driven by battle.json

battlestation.display.showIcon.description: Show icons next to button names

battlestation.display.showType.description: Show the type (NPM, Task, etc.) on the button

battlestation.display.showCommand.description: Show the command string on the button

battlestation.display.showGroup.description: Show group headers in the panel

battlestation.display.hideIcon.description: Icon to use for the 'Hide Action' button

battlestation.workspaceColors.markdownDescription: Custom background colors for specific workspaces (e.g. `{"client": "#ff0000"}`). Used when auto-generating config.
battlestation.workspaceColors.description: Custom background colors for specific workspaces

battlestation.customIconMappings.markdownDescription: Custom icon mappings for command types. Keys are command types, values are [codicon names](https://microsoft.github.io/vscode-codicons/dist/codicon.html). Example: `{"mytype": "rocket", "deploy": "cloud-upload"}`
battlestation.customIconMappings.description: Custom icon mappings for command types (type: codicon-name pairs)

battlestation.shells.markdownDescription: Map command types to specific shells. Example: `{"npm": "bash", "task": "pwsh"}`. If not specified, uses default terminal.

battlestation.secondaryGroups.markdownDescription: Configuration for secondary groups (workspaces). Key is the group name, value is an object with `color`, `icon`, etc.

battlestation.display.enableAutoActionCo.description: Automatically direct assign colors to actions based on their workspace folder

battlestation.colorRules.description: Rules for automatically coloring actions based on patterns

namePattern.description: Glob pattern to match against action name (e.g. '*test*')

commandPattern.description: Glob pattern to match against command string

type.description: Action type to match (npm, task, launch, etc.)

color.description: CSS color to apply (hex, rgb, or var(...))

battlestation.experimental.enableTodos.markdownDescription: **⚠️ EXPERIMENTAL**: Enable the integrated Todos panel. This feature is in early development and may change in future releases.
battlestation.experimental.enableTodos.description: Enable the experimental Todos panel feature

battlestation.experimental.enableEnhance.markdownDescription: **⚠️ EXPERIMENTAL**: Enable Enhanced Mode in the config generator. Hidden by default and may change without notice.
battlestation.experimental.enableEnhance.description: Enable the experimental Enhanced Mode section in the config generator

battlestation.display.playButtonBackgrou.description: Background color of the play button (default: transparent)

battlestation.display.density.description: Control the density of the layout (padding and spacing)

scripts.release:tag: git add package.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version to v$(node -p \"require('./package.json').version\")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push && git push --tags
